word_mean: 乙醛，醋醛：无色易燃液体，CH3CHO，有刺鼻味，一般用于制造乙酸、香料和调味品。本品亦为乙醇代谢之中间产物。乙醛可致粘膜刺激、流泪、羞明、结膜炎、角膜损伤、鼻炎、嗅觉缺失、支气管炎、肺炎、胸膜炎、头痛以及意识丧失
分子式为“ C H O”，原子数为7。

sentence.Network_en: The corresponding reaction of acetaldehyde is subject to general base catalysis.
sentence.Network_cn: 乙醛相应的反应服从广义的碱催化.

sentence.Network_en: During alcoholic fermentation acetaldehyde acts as a hydrogen acceptor instead of oxygen.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这个过程中乙醛取代了氧作为氢的受体.

sentence.Network_en: Alcohol dehydrogenase An enzyme that converts ethanol into acetaldehyde ( ethanal ).
sentence.Network_cn: 醇脱氢酶:把乙醇转化为 乙醛 的酶.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 乙字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 乙脑〖 encephalitisB〗 乙醛〖 aldehyde;acetaldehyde〗 乙炔〖 ethyne;acetylene〗.
在肝脏中主要是由肝微粒脢乙醇酸化系统进行代谢,酒精进入至肝脏后,在肝胞质液中(hepaticcytosol)被ADH(alcholdehydrogenase)催化,将酒精转变为醋醛(acetaldehyde)。.
relative accuracy 相对精度acetaldehyde 己醛；醋醛acetate 乙醋盐
为不可逆的抑制乙醛（acetaldehyde）去氢(酉每)的作用，使得酒精在体内代谢的乙醛无法代谢成醋酸并且积蓄在体内，进而引发不舒 …

means.word_mean: 1. a colorless volatile water-soluble liquid aldehyde used chiefly in manufacture of acetic acid and perfumes and drugs

auth_sentence.content: The acetaldehyde produced during drinking is then converted reasonably quickly into acetic acid, mostly harmless.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The acetaldehyde produced during drinking is then converted reasonably quickly into acetic acid, mostly harmless.

auth_sentence.content: In this two-step process, alcohol is turned into acetaldehyde, which then becomes acetate.
